price: Diejenigen, die Allahs Bund halten und das Abkommen nicht brechen
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا يَنقُضُونَ ٱلۡمِيثَٰقَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yūfūna biʿahdi al-lahi walā yanquḍūna al-mīthāqa
